mapper.select:
select r.id,d.device_name as device_name,r.item_id,i.name as item_name,defective.defective_number as defectiveNumber,r.hang_up as hangUp, t.name as inspection_type,i.unit,r.is_ok,r.exception_id ,i.up_limit,i.upup_limit,i.down_limit,i.downdown_limit ,e.name as exception_name,r.result,r.start_time,r.end_time,r.create_time,r.turn_id,turn.name as turn_name,s.name as device_status, r.user_id,u.username,r.is_check,r.remark,l.name as device_level,r.status_id,d.device_dept as dept_id,d.device_code,r.is_here,defective.confirmed_time, defective.order_confirmer,defective.order_confirmer_id,IFNULL(r.status,0) as orderStatus, defective.defective_id as defectiveId from `tb_inspection_result` r left join `tb_inspection_item` i on i.id = r.item_id left join `sys_user` u on u.user_id = r.user_id left join `tb_device` d on d.device_id = i.device_id left join `tb_inspection_type` t on t.id = i.inspection_type left join `tb_exception` e on e.id = r.exception_id left join `tb_turn` turn on turn.id = r.turn_id left join `tb_inspection_line` line on line.id = turn.inspection_line_id left join `tb_inspection_status` s on s.id = r.status_id left join `tb_device_level` l on l.id = d.device_level left join `tb_order_defective` defective on defective.result_id = r.id where 1=1 and r.is_ok != 0
and d.device_dept in
#{item}
and IFNULL(r.status,0) =${orderStatus}
and r.start_time >= CONCAT(#{startTime},' 00:00:00')
and r.end_time <= CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59')
order by r.id DESC

select r.defective_id, r.defective_number, r.defective_theme, r.defective_type, r.dept_id, r.exception_id ,r.order_content ,r.defective_name ,r.defective_name_id ,r.defective_name_opinion , r.create_time ,r.order_status ,r.order_confirmer ,r.order_confirmer_id, r.confirmed_time, r.order_confirmer_opinion ,r.order_acceptor ,r.order_acceptor_id ,r.requirement_time ,r.defective_device, r.result_id from tb_order_defective r left join `tb_exception` e on e.id = r.exception_id where r.result_id = #{resultId}
